### Invitation to Qualify: DFO Fiona Storm Damage Reconstruction and Repairs in Rose Blanche, NL
#### Contracting Agency
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Opportunity ID
* Reference Number: WS4153644185; Amendment Number: 1

#### Opportunity Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a procurement opportunity for the reconstruction and repairs of storm damage caused by Hurricane Fiona in Rose Blanche, Newfoundland and Labrador. This phase 2 solicitation follows an Invitation to Qualify and is only open to qualified suppliers who have been invited to participate.

#### Opportunity Details
The required work includes furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for the reconstruction and repairs of storm damage in Rose Blanche. The estimated value of the contract ranges from $5,000,001 to $20,000,000. A delivery schedule of 120 weeks after contract award is expected.

#### Bid Requirements
Bid security is a requirement for this tender. Suppliers must ensure they meet the necessary qualifications and standards outlined in the solicitation documents.

#### Additional Information
This procurement opportunity is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The Canadian entity hiring for this service is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).  
* CIF-SIC Code: 
  * 72140000 Heavy construction services
  * 72141200 Marine construction services
  * 72141206 Dredging services

#### Contact Information
* Contact: Alexandria Dwyer, Department of Public Works and Government Services
* Email: alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 

The gross should be on the contract enclosure. Bid opening date: October 4, 2023 @ 14:00:00 JSST.
